question: My mother says we cant make Dhur when men r still busy with Jumuah. Please advise on this. Must we wait for Jumuah Salat to commence before women make Dhur? or can we make normal time as everyday
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible for women to perform Dhuhr Salaat on a Friday from the time Zawaal ends. There is no need to wait for the Khutbah to end in the Musjid to perform the Dhuhr Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
